trans-unit.source: Specifies the identity of an assembly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies another instance to duplicate.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Specifies the version of the assembly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Specifies the version of the assembly.
Specifies the public key token of the assembly, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the assembly is signed.
Specifies the culture of the assembly.
A blank string indicates the invariant culture.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Specifies the version of the assembly.
Specifies the public key token of the assembly, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the assembly is signed.
Specifies the culture of the assembly.
A blank string indicates the invariant culture.
Specifies the processor architecture of the assembly.

Valid values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_msil" name="msil" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_x86" name="x86" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ia64" name="ia64" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_amd64" name="amd64" href=""></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity"></xref> class.
Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Specifies the version of the assembly.
Specifies the public key token of the assembly, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the assembly is signed.
Specifies the culture of the assembly.
A blank string indicates the invariant culture.
Specifies the processor architecture of the assembly.

Valid values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_msil" name="msil" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_x86" name="x86" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_ia64" name="ia64" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_amd64" name="amd64" href=""></xref>.
Specifies the type attribute of the assembly.
Valid values are <xref uid="langword_csharp_win32" name="win32" href=""></xref> or a blank string.
Gets or sets the culture of the assembly.
A string indicating the culture of the assembly.
A blank string indicates the invariant culture.
Parses string to obtain an assembly identity.
Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.
The resulting assembly identity.
Obtains identity of the specified assembly.
File can be a PE with an embedded xml manifest, a stand-alone xml manifest file, or a .NET assembly.
Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
The assembly identity of the specified file.
Obtains identity of the specified .NET assembly.
File must be a .NET assembly.
Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
The assembly identity of the specified file.
Obtains identity of the specified manifest file.
File must be a standalone XML manifest file.
Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
The assembly identity of the specified file.
Obtains identity of the specified native assembly.
File must be either a PE with an embedded XML manifest, or a stand-alone XML manifest file.
Returns NULL if identity could not be obtained.
The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
The assembly identity of the specified file.
To be added.
To be added.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if this assembly is part of the .NET Framework.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether this assembly is part of the .NET Framework.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if this assembly is part of the .NET Framework; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the assembly identity represents a neutral platform assembly.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the assembly identity represents a neutral platform assembly.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the assembly identity is a neutral platform assembly; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the assembly identity is a strong name.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the assembly identity is a strong name.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the assembly identity is a strong name; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the simple name of the assembly.
A string indicating the simple name of the assembly.
Gets or sets the processor architecture of the assembly.
Valid values are `msil`, `x86`, `ia64`, `amd64`.
A string representing the processor architecture of the assembly.
Gets or sets the public key token of the assembly, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the assembly is signed.
A string indicating the public key token of the assembly.
Returns the full ClickOnce assembly identity.
Returns the full ClickOnce assembly identity.
Gets or sets the type attribute of the assembly.
Valid values are `win32` or a blank string.
A string indicating the type attribute of the assembly.
Gets or sets the version of the assembly.
A string indicating the assembly version.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.Culture*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.Name*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.ProcessorArchitecture*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.PublicKeyToken*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.Type*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
Get or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity.Version*> property to an XML file.
To be added.
